result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 13, 2022 at 02:45 pm.
AMENDED Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

AMENDED Order for Bond Modification.
It is hereby ordered that:  Trina L. Stevens bond shall revert back to $2,500.00 cash with the conditions that she must maintain absolute sobriety and defendant must report to the Manitowoc County Sheriff's Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 48 hours, or if incarcerated within 72 hours of release.
Status conference on October 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.

records.addlTxt: Notice of Motion and Motion for Bond Modification.
AMENDED Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

Amended Order for Bond Modification.
IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that:
TRINA L. STEVENS bond shall modify the cash bail to $1,500.00. All
previous conditions will remain in effect. The Court adds that the defendant must
comply with an Electronic Monitoring Program as a condition of her bail.

Order for Bond Modification.
It is hereby ordered that the bail is modified to $1,500.00 cash.  All previous conditions will remain in effect. The Court adds that the defendant must comply with Electronic Monitoring Program as a condition of her bail.
Letter to Judge Dewane from defendant re: bail.
AMENDED Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Defendant in custody at Manitowoc County Jail.
The parties argue the motion.
The Court will modify the cash bail to $1,500.00.  All previous conditions will remain in effect.  The Court adds that the defendant must comply with Electronic Monitoring Program as a condition of her bail.
Attorney Blum to draft the order.
Status conference is set for 09-16-22 at 1:15 p.m.
Minutes.
Status conference on September 16, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
Motion hearing on August 19, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
It is hereby ordered the defendant's motion to modify bond is denied for the reasons stated on the record on July 22, 2022.

MOTION TO MODIFY BAIL - 
Defendant in custody at Manitowoc County Jail.
Attorney Blum argues for a significantly lower cash bail or recognizance bond.
Attorney LaBre objects to any modification in bail.
The Court comments and agrees that it is not appropriate to modify bail at this time.  Motion is denied.
State to draft the order.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Trina L Stevens
Current: Manitowoc County Jail, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 03-03-2022)
Prior: 204 N 8Th St 604, Manitowoc, WI 54220
RE:  Possess Fentanyl-2nd or subsequent offense, on 02-24-22.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crimes of possess methamphetamine, possess Fentanyl, possess THC and felony bail jumping.  The matters are continued for initial appearance on 03-07-22 at 1:30 p.m. Br. 3.  Bail is set at $2,500.00 cash with the conditions that she not possess any illegal controlled substances or drug paraphernalia; this includes syringes and maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol and drugs.  Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody.  Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued.  Copy filed.
Minutes.
